snorri.animations

Class Animation

  • java.lang.Object
    • snorri.animations.Animation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Animation
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    stores all the animation frames as Images (PNGS) to convert SWFs to PNGs, use the swfrender utility getSprite() should be used to iterate over frames
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
